name: Core_hashBytes
signature: Core_Result Core_hashBytes(Core_Size* RETURN, void *p, Core_Size n);

parameters.name: p
parameters.description: A pointer to an array of @{code('n')} Bytes.

parameters.name: n
parameters.description: The length, in Bytes, of the array pointed to by @{code('p')}. May be @{code('0')}.

description: Computes the hash value of the value @{code('x')}.
success: @{code('*RETURN')} was assigned the hash value of the value @{code('x')}.
remarks: This function sets the by-thread error variable on failure.
